Traffic.RoadNetwork

Class Block

  • java.lang.Object
    • Traffic.RoadNetwork.Block
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    IntersectionBlock, NormalBlock, TrafficBlock

    public abstract class Block
extends java.lang.Object
    Block.java - A superclass for the blocks that make up a lane
